Package org.flemil.ui

This package contains interfaces that represent the collective properties for components that can be displayed on the screen.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Item The interface that every component must implement for effective interaction with and manipulation by other components and display management utilities
Scrollable This interface is extended by nay item that can show ScrollBars such that it can contain Items that more than its displayRect both horizontally and vertically.
TextItem Interface that represents an Item that contains text or that can be used to display text to the user
Window This Interface represents an Item that represents a Window that can be displayed in the application.
 

Package org.flemil.ui Description

This package contains interfaces that represent the collective properties for components that can be displayed on the screen. Every item that can be displayed on the screen must implement the Item interface. Items that allow scrolling of their internal or contained items must implement the Scrollable interface which extends the Item interface. Any Item that is used to display text to the user must implement the TextItem interface and every Item that is to be displayed as a window must implement the Window interface. The interfaces bring together features that are specific to Items of a certain nature as well as features that should e available for all types of Items
